person.persName: Charles David Pennebaker (Nelson County house of Reps.)

body.p: Born on November 3, 1825 in Nelson County, Kentucky. Served in Kentucky House of Representatives from 1857-1859. Served in Kentucky Senate from 1859-1861. Colonel, 27th Kentucky Infantry 1861. Commanded Post of Munfordville, 2 Divison, 23 Army Corps, Department of the Ohio, Oct. 10-Nov. 2, 1863. Commanded 3 Brigade, 1 Divison, Cavalry Corps, Department of the Ohio Nov 1863-Jan 1864. Resigned April 10, 1864. Kentucky State Military Agent 1864-1865.
